author: Susan Green
title: Match Day – Geisel News
text: On Friday, March 17, Geisel School of Medicine’s MD Class of 2023 gathered with family and friends at the Lebanon Opera House to celebrate Match Day, signaling their transition to residency and the next steps on their medical careers. Post Tagged with: "Match Day" [Match Day 2023 Livestream](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2023/match-day-2023-livestream/) We live streamed video of our annual Match Day event on Friday, March 17 so that friends, family, and colleagues could join in the excitement. You can watch the event here. [Geisel Celebrates Match Day 2022](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2022/geisel-celebrates-match-day-2022/) For the first time in three years, graduating medical students gathered in person with family and friends on Dartmouth’s campus for the eagerly anticipated and emotional annual event—one of the most celebrated and important days of their medical career—Match Day. [Match Day 2022 Livestream](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2022/match-day-2022-livestream/) We will be streaming live video of our annual Match Day event so that friends, family, and colleagues can join in the excitement. Tune in here on Friday, March 18 at 11:40 AM, to watch live video of Geisel’s 2022 Match Day event. Please use the hashtag #Geisel22s to follow the event on social media and to share good wishes and memories with the class. Congratulations to the Class of ’22!! [Geisel Celebrates Match Day 2021](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2021/geisel-celebrates-match-day-2021/) On Match Day on March 19th, Geisel medical students of the Class of 2021 learned where they’ll spend their residency. [Match Day 2021 Livestream](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2021/save-the-date-match-day-2021/) We will be streaming live video of our annual Match Day event so that friends, family, and colleagues can join in the excitement. Tune in here on Friday, March 19 at 1:00 PM, to watch live video of Geisel’s 2021 Match Day event. Please use the hashtag #Geisel21s to follow the event on social media and to share good wishes and memories with the Class of 2021. Good luck to all our students participating in the Match! [Match Day—A Medical School Milestone](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2020/match-day-2020/) On Match Day thousands of fourth-year medical students across the U.S simultaneously learn where they will start their residency training after graduation. For medical students, the annual event is one of the most anticipated, exciting, and emotional days of their medical education. Check out our slideshow video highlighting where the Class of 2020 matched. [It’s a Match! Geisel Med Students Celebrate Match Day](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2019/its-a-match-geisel-med-students-celebrate-match-day/) This year, 100 graduating students at the Geisel School of Medicine joined a record high 38,376 U.S. and international medical students and graduates vying for 35,185 residency positions, the most ever offered in the national Match. [Match Day 2019 Video](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2019/match-day-2019-live/) For medical students, the annual Match Day event is one of the most anticipated and exciting days of their medical education as they discover where they will start their residency training after graduation. Once again, we will be streaming live video of our Match Day event so that friends, family, and colleagues can join in the excitement. Visit [dartgo.org/match2019](http://dartgo.org/match2019) on Friday, March 15 at 11:45 AM, to watch live video of Geisel’s 2019 Match Day event. **UPDATE: Thanks to everyone who joined us live for Match Day 2019! If you missed this year’s event, you can still watch video from the event here. [Geisel Students Celebrate Match Day Success](https://geiselmed.dartmouth.edu/news/2018/geisel-students-celebrate-match-day-success/) On Match Day, fourth-year students at the Geisel School of Medicine joined thousands of fellow medical students across the U.S. as they discovered where they will start their residency training after graduation.
